text:
My son has been with this school for almost 6 years. This school is academic oriented and has helped my son to grow and learn many things. School teachers are amazing and are always ready to help and looking out for the students. They provide 1-on-1 focus on each child strength and weakness and help them to achieve success. My son is blessed to have such an amazing teachers in his early years of learning.
Thankful and greatful to all the staff of SFMS.

I am grateful to all the teachers in this school. Every teacher is full of love and enthusiasm. My child has been studying here for two years and is very happy every day. I would like to especially thank Ms Eugenia for always giving my child a lot of encouragement and help.ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹
I enjoy teaching and learning in this Christian school where colleagues and students are nice. Our primary and high school students explore creativity and functionality when designing their art.

From the patient and kind teachers to amazing school we can practise socially and academically. Our school principal, Mr Lee, has always pushed us and supportive giving us talks and encouragement. Thank you Sfms

It is a great school to work with, where the school would like every student to have a success story to tell. It is a school with a heart for students. Things are still improving, but the Principal, together with parents and teachers, will make it work. Together we can! :)
